description.displayText:
I recently had a very dear friend that was in need of a care giver. 
My dear friend and her wonderful friend met ShaMika S. She was chosen at the first meeting.
Shay was the most attentive , caring, giving , and compassionate person. My friend immediately felt safe, cared for and peaceful in Shay’s care.
Shay would be right there by her side and was with her until her last breath.
Shay cried and said her goodbyes with love and affection and sat with my friend until the family arrived.
Shamika S was a God send and was such a blessing to my dear friend during her last few weeks.
Thank you ShaMika for caring and being with my sweet friend at the end of her earthly life.
You are special and loved , God bless you and your ability to give your quiet, thoughtful caring ways to another human.
Grateful,
Pat
description.originalText:

Shamika came in late stage in Juanita’s life and made an instant connection. She truly cared for and made a huge difference in the quality of J’s life. Shamika assisted in medication management, personal hygiene, food assistance and comfort care. She was a blessing in a difficult time and made the last days easier for all involved.
